text: @HawkesworthAnne @YWHelp @Claire_Gazette @IlkleyChat @YorkshireWater Do you have the date Anne? It might be one we reported. If not the @EnvAgencyYNE wont know about it and it needs logging. Every time it happens we (Ilkley) need to ring the Environment Agency Hotline 0800 80 70 60 and please let us know incident number as we keep track.
RT @EnvAgency: Transporting waste around the world is part of a multi-million-pound industry, and waste criminals can take advantage of thi‚Ä¶

@YWHelp @YorkshireWater @EnvAgencyYNE this is an offense. its happening regularly. We report it. It needs more than sticking manholes down, alarming and sending out clean up team. What is the plan? Its been a year of reporting now https://t.co/TyoO54he5H

Day 45 of talking about harmful and dangerous #PFAS and #PFOS chemicals in UK waters.

No one listening. No action.

Being ignored doesn't make the problem go away. 
 @EnvAgency @DefraWater @GeorgeMonbiot @carolecadwalla @BBCNews @Channel4News @jonsnowC4 @EnvAgencyYNE
#CleanWater
